title: Self-Organization of Spatio-Temporal Hierarchy via Learning of ...
summary: This article explores the self-organization of spatio-temporal hierarchy through learning, combining spatial and temporal processing in a neural network model for contextual recognition of dynamic visual patterns.
usefulness_reason: The title and content directly address 'Spatio-Temporal Hierarchy' and 'Contextual recognition,' making it highly relevant to spatio-temporal data and contextual datasets. While not explicitly about point processes or survey data, the core concepts align well with the broader search.
